articles.title: Masters: Scottie Scheffler leads at Augusta, Cameron Smith & Shane Lowry chasing - BBC
articles.description: American Scottie Scheffler remains in a good position to win his first major at the Masters, but sees his lead reduced late in Saturday's third round.
articles.content:
<table><tr><th>Masters 2022 third-round leaderboard</th></tr>

articles.author: The Canadian Press
articles.title: Canada's Gushue to face host Americans in semi at world men's curling championship - TSN
articles.description: Canada's Brad Gushue will face American Korey Dropkin on Saturday night in semifinal play at the world men's curling championship.
articles.content:
LAS VEGAS Canada's Brad Gushue will face American Korey Dropkin on Saturday night in semifinal play at the world men's curling championship.

articles.title: Ford Honors Holman Moody With Special Heritage Edition GT - AutoJosh
articles.description: Ford GT has reached the end of its production life but it’s not going away without offering something special (probably limited) in the veil of the Holman Moody Heritage Edition. The American race team based in Charlotte, North Carolina, campaigned three GT40…
